      • constructSite

        protected Site constructSite(com.vaadin.server.VaadinRequest request)
        Description copied from class: AbstractSiteUI
        Application constructSite phase based on the VaadinRequest. This phase need to construct the site and all composites it needs but not initialize the site.
        Specified by:
        constructSite in class AbstractSiteUI
        Parameters:
        request - the VaadinRequest
        Returns:
        the constructed site
